course_title: Building a GPT model from scratch
course_summary: This course provides an all-inclusive guide to building a Generalized Pre-training Transformer (GPT) model from scratch. Participants will gain hands-on experience with building and training this language processing AI model. They'll explore Python code examples and deep dive into understanding how this language model reads and understands text data for effective predictions.

submodules.submodule_summary: Explains the basic principles and purpose of NLP
Covers techniques like tokenizing, stemming, and lemmatization
Explains what GPT is, its architecture, and how it differs from other models
Discuss how GPT leverages transfer learning and benefits from it
Walks you through the process of preparing and cleaning the dataset for the model
Guides on how to implement the GPT model from scratch
Details the process necessary to train the GPT model
Showcases methods to test and evaluate the performance of the trained model
Demonstrates how to fine-tune GPT models for better outputs
Explores various real world applications where GPTs can be used
